template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a realistic end-to-end operational workflow in the {industry} domain that would require coordinating multiple tools, resolving at least one constraint, updating systems, and delivering a final outcome; output only the prompt text and keep it under 40 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a realistic end-to-end operational workflow in the healthcare domain that would require coordinating multiple tools, resolving at least one constraint, updating systems, and delivering a final outcome; output only the prompt text and keep it under 40 words.

message.content: Coordinate a surgery by checking OR and surgeon availability, resolve a schedule conflict, update the EHR and billing systems, and confirm the final appointment with the patient.
message.reasoning_content:
Hmm, the user wants a concise single-sentence prompt for a healthcare workflow. It needs to be realistic, end-to-end, and involve multiple tools, constraint resolution, system updates, and a final outcome. 

Okay, keeping it under 40 words means every word counts. Healthcare workflows often involve scheduling, resource allocation, and patient coordination. A surgery scheduling scenario fits well—it requires checking OR availability (tool coordination), resolving surgeon conflicts (constraint), updating EHRs (system updates), and confirming the schedule (final outcome). 

The sentence should flow naturally while hitting all the requirements. Avoiding jargon keeps it plain-English. Let me structure it: action (coordinate), tools (OR, surgeon, EHR), constraint (surgeon’s schedule), updates (EHR), and outcome (surgery confirmed).
